title: Street Fighter 3: Third Strike Tier List
description: A breakdown of Street Fighter 3: Third Strike characters into tiers based on their overall strength and viability in competitive play. This tier list provides a general overview of character performance and is subject to change based on the evolving meta.
heading: Street Fighter 3: Third Strike Tier List
introText: A breakdown of Street Fighter 3: Third Strike characters into tiers based on their overall strength and viability in competitive play. This tier list provides a general overview of character performance and is subject to change based on the evolving meta.

data.itemDescription: Exceptional zoning, powerful pokes, and versatile combos
Excellent mix-ups, aggressive playstyle, and strong pressure
Balanced character with a strong neutral game and powerful combos
Unique and versatile playstyle, strong zoning, and mix-ups
Strong zoning and defensive playstyle, but can struggle against aggressive opponents
Versatile character with a focus on grapples and footsies
Slow and heavy, with limited mobility and reliance on command grabs
A jack-of-all-trades character, but lacks the standout strengths of other characters
